name: Don't Forget Me (itch)
description:
This is the story of a little ghost trying to move on.

Moving on is not an easy task. You fear forgetting or being forgotten. You fear what challenges lie ahead. However if you don't move on then you are doomed to live an existence just floating around for eternity. Do you have the strength?

Goals

  1. Custom Sprites
  2. Custom Music
  3. Custom Battle System
  4. Custom Tilesets
  5. Several Full Puzzle Levels

DEVELOPER NOTE: The  game is sadly far from finished.   I was a bit too ambitious while planning and then got really sick partway through. Overall I'm happy with what I accomplished in the time I could spare.

 I do hope to finish the story and add in the puzzles I had originally planned in the future. Hopefully the short tutorial/opening gives you an idea on what's to come!
